Pronunciation:
tS i n _ tS aI
t s i n _ t s aI
Definition: A phrase used in Singlish to refer to something done in a casual or nonchalant manner, without much care or concern. It can also be used to describe someone who is indecisive or unsure and can be used as an answer to mean 'anything'.
Example: 1. A: "Eh, you want to go eat at that new restaurant ah?" B: "Chin chai lah, I don't really mind."
